response.original_title: Mike Tyson vs. Roy Jones Jr.
response.overview: Mike Tyson vs. Roy Jones Jr. is an upcoming exhibition boxing match contested between former undisputed heavyweight world champion, Mike Tyson, and former four-division world champion, Roy Jones Jr. The bout is scheduled to take place on November 28, 2020, at STAPLES Center in Los Angeles, California. The bout will be officially sanctioned by the California State Athletic Commission (CSAC).
response.title: Mike Tyson vs. Roy Jones Jr.
